name: My Colouring Book - Fun Fruit Sketch Pad Game
name_original: My Colouring Book - Fun Fruit Sketch Pad Game
description:
My First Colouring Book for kids! A drawing game with delightful fruit characters.

Fun characters float around, making fun sounds. You don't have to colour in - you can just play with the fruit characters!

Chose your colour by tapping on each fruit character.

Move the fruit characters around with your finger.

Drawing pad for kids of all ages.

Great for travelling in cars, planes or by sea.

Hours of fun!
